dmca.title: Google DMCA - Bruno Medici
dmca.body:
BRUNO MEDICI Photography	Tel: 01923 253 933
Studio::Clerkenwell, London EC1 - Head Office: Bushey, Hertfordshire - www.brunomedici.com
Member of the British Professional Photographers Association and the Society of Wedding and Portrait Photographers

Google Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

Fax: (650) 963-3255, Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints

REF: [# 02071474] Copyright theft

Dear Sir Madam

Following your e-mail, please find enclosed details of the copyright infringement as requested.


1)The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on the Website of: www.brunomedici.com Index Page, (small grey text at the bottom of the page beginning with: Reportage Style, Documentary Wedding Photography...etc)

2)Search query Google Infringing WebPages: www.eps103.co.uk the copyrighted text was copied from the Index Page of www.brunomedici.com and pasted on to Ealing Photographic Studio webpage (this is very clear as they left in place all the links pointing to various pages of my website, by Clicking on the small gray text at the bottom of the page you will be redirected to Bruno Medici Photography website)

Google Search:

Ealing Photographic Studio - Award Winning Photography
Ealing Photographic Studio is now one of the most leading Wedding & Portrait studios in West London. Our team is friendly and courteous and very helpful if ... www.eps103.co.uk - 24k - Cached - Similar pages


3)Bruno Medici e-mail address: bruno@brunomedici.com


4)Other party details: Ealing Photographic Studio - Mr. Vinod Verma
Tel: 020 8404443 Fax: 0208 8404443
Email: in o@eps103.co.uk

5)"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly Infringing WebPages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."


6)"I swear, under penally of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

Yours faithfully
Bruno Medici
